forests.short_description: Protecting the fall foliage in Maine.
forests.long_description: This conservation project is situated in a crucial and vulnerable location in Northern Maine, on the outskirts of Acadia.

forests.short_description: A tropical forest in South America.
forests.long_description: Tropical forests are among the most critical for conservation. Tikal Guatemala is an area known for its biodiversity and incredible natural beauty.

forests.short_description: Conservation of the subtropical evergreens of Taiwan.
forests.long_description: Located in the lowlands of Taiwan towards the north, this conservation effort has been ongoing for nearly three decades.

forests.short_description: A small-scale reforestation effort in the United Kingdom.
forests.long_description: This reforestation effort is located in the muuiddle of Wales, and is bringing together communities and NGOs to the effort.

forests.short_description: A conservation effort in norther Europe.
forests.long_description: Estonian forests are unique for their natural character and proximity to small population centers.

forests.short_description: Threatened birch and alder forests in the Swedish countrysuuide.
forests.long_description: These forests in the Swedish country are threatened by industry and development.
